verses.text: How \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* art thou, \w my|strong="H1157"\w* love, how \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* art thou! thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* dovesâ€™ \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, besides \w what|strong="H1157"\w* \w is|strong="H5869"\w* hid within. Thy \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* \w is|strong="H5869"\w* \w as|strong="H3303"\w* \w flocks|strong="H5739"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*, \w which|strong="H5869"\w* Come up \w from|strong="H5869"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* Galaad.

Thy \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w flocks|strong="H5739"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w sheep|strong="H5927"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0369"\w* \w shorn|strong="H7094"\w* which \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w washing|strong="H7367"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w twins|strong="H8382"\w*, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* barren \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w them|strong="H5927"\w*.

Thy \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w are|strong="H8193"\w* \w as|strong="H5000"\w* \w a|strong="H1157"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* lace: \w and|strong="H8193"\w* thy \w speech|strong="H8193"\w* sweet. Thy cheeks \w are|strong="H8193"\w* \w as|strong="H5000"\w* \w a|strong="H1157"\w* \w piece|strong="H6400"\w* \w of|strong="H8193"\w* \w a|strong="H1157"\w* \w pomegranate|strong="H7416"\w*, besides that which lieth hid within.

Thy \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*, \w is|strong="H3605"\w* as \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, which \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* bulwarks: \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* bucklers \w hang|strong="H8518"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* armour \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w valiant|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*.

Thy \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* \w like|strong="H7799"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H6082"\w* roes that \w are|strong="H8147"\w* \w twins|strong="H8380"\w*, which \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* among \w the|strong="H8147"\w* \w lilies|strong="H7799"\w*.

\w Till|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* break, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* shadows retire, \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H2022"\w* go \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w myrrh|strong="H4753"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w*.

Thou art \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w fair|strong="H3303"\w*, O \w my|strong="H3605"\w* love, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H0369"\w* \w spot|strong="H3971"\w* \w in|strong="H3303"\w* thee.

\w Come|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* Libanus, \w my|strong="H0935"\w* spouse, \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* Libanus, \w come|strong="H0935"\w*: thou shalt be crowned \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Amana|strong="H0549"\w*, \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* Sanir \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w Hermon|strong="H2768"\w*, \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w dens|strong="H4585"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w lions|strong="H0738"\w*, \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2042"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w leopards|strong="H5246"\w*.

Thou hast wounded my heart, my \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, my spouse, thou hast wounded my heart \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* hair \w of|strong="H5869"\w* thy \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*.

\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3302"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* thy breasts, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* spouse! thy breasts \w are|strong="H4100"\w* more \w beautiful|strong="H3302"\w* \w than|strong="H3605"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sweet|strong="H1314"\w* smell \w of|strong="H3605"\w* thy ointments above \w all|strong="H3605"\w* aromatical \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*.

Thy \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, \w my|strong="H8478"\w* spouse, \w are|strong="H8193"\w* \w as|strong="H8478"\w* \w a|strong="H8478"\w* dropping honeycomb, \w honey|strong="H1706"\w* \w and|strong="H2461"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w are|strong="H8193"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* thy \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*; \w and|strong="H2461"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* smell \w of|strong="H8478"\w* thy \w garments|strong="H8008"\w*, \w as|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* smell \w of|strong="H8478"\w* frankincense.

My \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, my spouse, \w is|strong="H0269"\w* \w a|strong="H2856"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* enclosed, \w a|strong="H2856"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* enclosed, \w a|strong="H2856"\w* \w fountain|strong="H4599"\w* \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \w up|strong="H2856"\w*.

Thy \w plants|strong="H5373"\w* \w are|strong="H5973"\w* a paradise \w of|strong="H6529"\w* \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w fruits|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H6529"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w orchard|strong="H6508"\w*. Cypress \w with|strong="H5973"\w* spikenard.

Spikenard \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w saffron|strong="H3750"\w*, \w sweet|strong="H7070"\w* \w cane|strong="H7070"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w cinnamon|strong="H7076"\w*, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* Libanus, \w myrrh|strong="H4753"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w aloes|strong="H0174"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* perfumes.

\w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w fountain|strong="H4599"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w gardens|strong="H1588"\w*: \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w well|strong="H0875"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w which|strong="H4325"\w* run \w with|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* strong \w stream|strong="H4325"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* Libanus.

\w Arise|strong="H5782"\w*, \w O|strong="H1730"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w wind|strong="H8486"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w O|strong="H1730"\w* \w south|strong="H8486"\w* \w wind|strong="H8486"\w*, \w blow|strong="H6315"\w* \w through|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* let \w the|strong="H0935"\w* aromatical \w spices|strong="H1314"\w* thereof \w flow|strong="H5140"\w*.
